summary: A ENB preset aiming for a realistic look with as little frame-rate drop as possible.
descriptionHtml:
Credit goes to IthilgaladHalfElven for providing the base work for this ENB.

The NMM version includes options for:
1. Brightness patch - select the optional brightness patch if you think the original contrast is too high
2. Performance version - while it cuts out some of the effects, the performance version should run much smoother on older PCs

[size=12][b]To install:[/b][/size]
1. Download with NMM
2. Activate through NMM, follow on-screen installation
3. IMPORTANT: Go into the Skyrim/Data/BleakRealismENB_files/ folder and run INSTALL_BLEAK_REALISM_ENB.bat

[size=12][b]To uninstall:[/b][/size]
1. BEFORE de-activating through NMM, go to Skyrim/Data/BleakRealismENB_files/ and run UNINSTALL_BLEAK_REALISM_ENB.bat
2. De-activate through NMM.

[size=12][b]Recommended Mods[/b][/size]

To get water and trees like in the images, you need to get these mods:

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076]Realistic Water Two[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938]Watercolor for ENB[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]

[size=12]Suggestions?[/size]

If you have any suggestions on how to improve the look of this ENB (not if you have problems or things not working), please reply to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55627/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D55627%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1877380&pUp=1]THIS COMMENT[/url] in the post section. Thank you.
author: ZenonSeth
